Stage 1: Pre-Commit (Local)

â””â”€ npm run lint

â”œâ”€ Type checking (TypeScript)
â”œâ”€ Unit tests (Pytest, Vitest)

â”œâ”€ Security scanning
â””â”€ Dependency audit

Stage 4: Code Quality
â”œâ”€ Complexity analysis
â”œâ”€ Duplication check
â”œâ”€ TODO/FIXME tracking
â”œâ”€ Performance hints
â””â”€ Dependency review

â”œâ”€ All checks must pass
â”œâ”€ 1+ approvals required
â””â”€ Conversation resolved

Stage 6: Merge to Main
â”œâ”€ All gates passed
â”œâ”€ Automatic release (optional)
â””â”€ Deploy documentation

## ğŸ¯ Optimization Strategy

```
Speed Optimizations:
â”œâ”€ Caching
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Poetry dependencies (~2min saved)
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Yarn dependencies (~1min saved)
â”‚  â””â”€ Docker layers (~5min saved)
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Parallel Execution
â”‚  â”œâ”€ API + Web + Docker (concurrent)
â”‚  â””â”€ Independent jobs (concurrent)
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Smart Triggers
â”‚  â”œâ”€ Only changed files (PR)
â”‚  â””â”€ Skip on [skip ci]
â”‚
â””â”€ Fail Fast
   â”œâ”€ Stop on critical errors
   â””â”€ Continue on warnings
```
